`++-- lhopital_zero_right_on_Ico`
`++-- lhopital_zero_right_on_Ioo`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>

:v: semorrison can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10279752275/job/28445704302)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10279752275/job/28445703886)

```suggestion
lemma mapsTo_biSup_of_mapsTo {ι : Type*} {N : ι → Submodule R M}
```
Better be explicit (is `Sort` allowed? Will Lean decide that it has to be `Prop`?)

This problem is not as severe as it used to be: Lean can only change the meaning based on the signature, not only the body, now. But sure, it doesn't hurt to be explicit!

There are going to be more of these in future PRs!
